channel.title: Can u get sued from a 508?
channel.description: I want to know cause i dont want to get sued scince it looks like rs.

item.title: Can u get sued from a 508?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“pwnedurmom, post:18, topic:267920”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=353699.msg2711235#msg2711235 date=1237322615]
Most of you are guessing…
[/quote]
Not me BOIIIII !
I know my rights, Unlike most of 11-year-olds in this forum.[/quote]I’m 16.

Even if it were illegal, and there was a chance that you could be sued, I’m almost positive you’d still try for a 508. So what’s the point in even asking.

Read full topic

item.source: Can u get sued from a 508?

item.title: Can u get sued from a 508?
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

[quote=“rofllewisrofl, post:12, topic:267920”]Only for 508 webclients.

If there found by Jagex.[/quote][quote=“Da 0wnz, post:13, topic:267920”]I would think no. If they’re going to go for anyone they’re going to head towards mopar first (no offence mopar just saying) and if they would try to sue mopar you would know it and can immediatly shut down your server without jagex ever taking a blink. And no way is Jagex going to look at little tiny pieces of server that many people don’t play. They are going to head for the bigger RSPS corperations. Point being, don’t worry bout it. Mopar has your back if anything would ever happen. -Da 0wnz.[/quote]

Both Failure.

Mopar does not “have your back”. If they get sued, basically their ganna go AMF.
(Audios Mother F…)

You can get sued for anything, and JaGeX will most likely win if you don’t have TOS set up.
Everything todo with “Private servers” is sue-able.
JaGeX didn’t release the source code for us to take and download, We found the cache and dled and started making it our own.
Still not our work, JaGeX made it first and slapped a CopyRight on it.
So, Yeah.

T.O.S-Terms of Service.
TOS is that little screen you see before you enter MoparScape, the one you have to type “yes” on and click enter.
Yeah, that prevents JaGeX from legally looking at MoparScape. In a court case, MoparScape would most likely win because of it. The fact that JaGeX wasn’t supposed to be viewing it, and did anyways disregarding the TOS, would prevent them from winning the case.

Hope you enjoyed that lecture. ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 02:30:56 pm[/size][hr][quote=“ziplock, post:7, topic:267920”][quote author=Hellz Scape link=topic=353699.msg2710272#msg2710272 date=1237254342]
Yes they do, they can look at your hard drive.
[/quote]

Haha; if Jagex looked at my hard drive I would defiantly counter-sue them.

People overestimate the power of Jagex, because they cannot legally search your hard drive without a search warrant; it is just like any other piece of property, and they have no higher authority than you. (I am of course referring to the U.S laws and constitution, and if they wish to hold a trial in the property of the U.S then they shall abide the law of the land.)[/quote]

Amendment #4 of our Constitution. <3
Also I love #5 teww <3

Read full topic
item.source: Can u get sued from a 508?

item.title: Can u get sued from a 508?
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

I would think no. If they’re going to go for anyone they’re going to head towards mopar first (no offence mopar just saying) and if they would try to sue mopar you would know it and can immediatly shut down your server without jagex ever taking a blink. And no way is Jagex going to look at little tiny pieces of server that many people don’t play. They are going to head for the bigger RSPS corperations. Point being, don’t worry bout it. Mopar has your back if anything would ever happen. -Da 0wnz.

Read full topic

item.title: Can u get sued from a 508?
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:9, topic:267920”][quote author=pwnedurmom link=topic=353699.msg2710287#msg2710287 date=1237255651]
Yes.
[/quote]

Of course you are right, because anyone can sue for anything… This dose not mean they will win.

I could sue you for posting that, but of course i would not win.[/quote]
I could sue you for posting a threat to sue me, I WOULD win.
Everything on this website is sue-able, JaGeX is not allowed to sue because their legally not allowed to see it.
TOS my friend.

Read full topic
